products.title: Hive Plain Black Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Hive Plain Black Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX71004. A contemporary dim-out blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal properties and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hive Plain Black Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Privacy non-Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Hive Plain" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.

products.title: Hive Blackout Black Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Hive Blackout Black Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72004. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hive Blackout Black Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Hive Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric.  Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
